NK103(pe)004:1: // ka rma s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ////
NK103(pe)004:4: dz+ny+aa na rid ti pra ti har+ya kar+m+aa tsa t+wa ri pa ri pun+na sh+aa sta n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)004:6: rang byung gi ye shes cis kyang stong pa las
NK103(pe)004:7: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul cir yang mi 'gag par
NK103(pe)004:8: las bzhir yongs su rdzogs par 'char bar bstan pa
NK103(pe)004:9: zhes bya ba // rang bzhin bcom rnam pa ldan
NK103(pe)004:10: mtshan nyid 'das rang byung ye shes kyi rol pa
NK103(pe)004:11: mi 'gag pa'i thugs rjes mdzad pa las bzhir rdzogs
NK103(pe)004:12: pa sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)004:13: 'gro ba rnams rang dang mthun pas grol bar bya te //
NK103(pe)004:14: sdug bsngal gyi dngos por zhen cing brtags pa'i yul la //
NK103(pe)004:15: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa spros bral du
NK103(pe)004:16: 'das na smon lam gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i
NK103(pe)004:17: thugs rje'i lcags kyu'ang rang gi mos pa'i 'dod pa
NK103(pe)004:19: 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams rang
NK103(pe)004:20: dang mthun pas de la bskyab pa'i phyir don gyi
NK103(pe)004:21: gnas lugs nyid rol pa mi 'gag pa'i rdzu 'phrul
NK103(pe)004:22: gyi chos // phrin las bzhi bya byed kyis ma
NK103(pe)004:23: btsal la yongs su rdzogs pa nyid du bstan pa'i
NK103(pe)004:24: thugs rje'i mdzad pa'i phrin las nyid bstan par bya'o
NK103(pe)004:25: gyi chos // // ye nas gnas pa'i gzhi dang
NK103(pe)004:26: 'gag med don grub kyi ngo bo ming don nges
NK103(pe)004:28: grangs kyis dbye ba rgyun chad pa'i skyon btsal med
NK103(pe)004:29: rdzogs pa'i yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i gdeng rtsol
NK103(pe)004:30: sgrub med pa'i srog bya ba'i thabs so //
NK103(pe)004:31: ma skyes pas rang byung rang gsal bas ye shes
NK103(pe)004:32: su gzung 'dzin rnam par dag pa nyid mu mtha'
NK103(pe)004:33: // cis kyang stong pa'i rang bzhin la rdzu 'phrul gyi //
NK103(pe)004:35: dus dang rnam pa kun tu shar bar ye nas gnas pas gazhi'o //
NK103(pe)004:36: thugs rje'i rol pa cir yang ma 'gags par //
NK103(pe)004:37: 'char ba des gdul bya'i 'dod pa kun grub cing tshim par mdzad pa ni //
NK103(pe)004:38: rtsol bas btsal lam ma btsal bar rang shar ba gang yin pa'ang rung ngo //
NK103(pe)004:39: bsgrub bya'i don las kyi 'bras bu bzhir gdul bya la smin pa mdzad pa de'o //
NK103(pe)004:40: tshig tsam ma yin par don du go zhing blo la 'char ba'i thabs ni //
NK103(pe)004:41: gsung du brjod pa'am ma brjod kyang don gyis mjal //
NK103(pe)004:42: don bzhi 'grub pa la yon tan gyi basngagasa pa nye bar brjod pas phrin las so //
NK103(pe)004:43: spyod cing dang du len pa'i phyir las te phrin las kyi ming du nges pa'o //
NK103(pe)004:44: 'jig pa'i me gyen du 'bar bas tshangs pa chen
NK103(pe)004:45: pos 'i gzhal med khang stong pa bsreg pa la
NK103(pe)004:46: 'od gsal gyi lha bran 'jig rten 'jig chags la
NK103(pe)004:48: me lce 'dir 'ong snyam nas 'jigs pa las lha
NK103(pe)004:49: rgan po mkhas pas bskyabs gsung du ma 'jigs sngar
NK103(pe)004:50: kyang 'di bzhin du byung ste de nyid du nub
NK103(pe)004:51: bo zhes sngags pa dang 'phrin 'dra la //
NK103(pe)004:52: 'jig pa la rten pa'i snod bcud chags pa'i bya ba dag /
NK103(pe)004:53: phyi snod dang nang bcud chags par byed pas de 'grub par byed pa lta bu'o ni las so //
NK103(pe)004:54: thugs rjes 'gro 'dul gyi las dang rang bzhin lhun grub kyi phrin las dang //
NK103(pe)004:55: rnam pa gnyis su gsang ba'i le'u lnga pa las bshad pa ni gang zhe na //
NK103(pe)004:56: rtogs goms kyi gdeng la gnas nas mdzad pa'i phrin las bzhis //
NK103(pe)004:57: gang 'dul ba'i gdul bya thugs rjes skyob pa dang //
NK103(pe)004:58: don mdzad pa'i rtsol ba las grol bar //
NK103(pe)004:59: rtogs goms la don gyis las bzhir lhun gyis grub pa'o rgyan las //
NK103(pe)004:60: ye shes rang snang zhes pa drang //
NK103(pe)004:61: mnyam grol du gnas pa'i don gyis mu bzhi lhun gyis grub cing rdzogs pa la //
NK103(pe)004:62: phyogs 'dzin kyis rtogs pas rol pa rnam dag stong pa nyid du //
NK103(pe)004:63: nges par gnas la smon lam gyis don byed pa thugs rje'i lcags kyu yang //
NK103(pe)004:64: stong pa la zhen pa'i dbang du gsungs pa tsam
NK103(pe)004:65: ste 'gro don gyi gzhi bkag pas thugs rje rgyun
NK103(pe)004:66: chad pa'o // rang bzhin gyi rnam par dag pa
NK103(pe)004:67: phyogs 'dzin gyis stong pa nyid ni rin chen yon
NK103(pe)004:69: rol pa mi 'gag pa'i sprul pa sna tshogs lhun gyis grub par gnas pa yis //
NK103(pe)004:70: thugs rje dang 'dul thabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis //
NK103(pe)004:71: ched du ma btsal bar rang gzhan gyi don grub pas rdzogs pa che'o //
NK103(pe)004:72: rang rig pa'i ye shes spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid //
NK103(pe)004:73: gdod ma nas rnam pa ma 'gags par cir yang shar bas //
NK103(pe)004:74: che ba'i yon tan rgyun mi 'chad ba des na ched du rtsol bas //
NK103(pe)004:75: ma btsal bar don bzhi rdzogs pa'i gdeng chen po dang ldan no //
NK103(pe)004:76: gdeng chen des na thugs rjes kun la khyab pas blang dor med pa la //
NK103(pe)004:77: bya btsal dang bral ba'i srog gis gnas pa'i //
NK103(pe)004:78: don la gdeng chud pa'i skyes bu chen po des //
NK103(pe)004:79: gdul bya la thugs rjes bskyod pa ltar snang kyang don la bya btsal dang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)004:80: de nyid bya ba'i thabs la las bzhi'i gdul bya dang mdzad pa po dang //
NK103(pe)004:81: rdzas dang lha dang sgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang
NK103(pe)004:82: bzlas pa'i sngags dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang byed
NK103(pe)004:83: pa'i dus // 'dug cing lta ba'i phyogs dang so
NK103(pe)004:84: so'i kha dog dang rten pa'i gnas dang kha zas
NK103(pe)004:85: pa'i dus // dang // de yis gdul bya smin pa'i 'bras bu'o //
NK103(pe)004:86: phyi 1dang nang 2dang gsang 3ba dang don 4gyi dgras //
NK103(pe)004:87: lus 1dang rnam rtog 2dang 'dod 3pa dang phyogs 4'dzin du bsad 0pa zhi ba dang //
NK103(pe)004:88: de 0dag don la rtogs goms gyi dgongs pas dbul //
NK103(pe)004:90: rkyen gzhan gyi dbang du song bas nus pa dang bral ba rnams rang dbang du bya //
NK103(pe)004:91: rkyen las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du song ba'i
NK103(pe)004:92: stobs kyis sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag pa rnams bsgral
NK103(pe)004:93: ba'o // mu mtha' rnam par dag pa stong pa nyid kyi ngang du blo gnas pas //
NK103(pe)004:94: don bya ba'i yul gyis blo gzhan du mi khrid cing //
NK103(pe)004:95: spros pa dang bral bas thugs kun la khyab pas
NK103(pe)004:96: rje rgyun mi 'chad pa'i thag pas gdul bya'i rgyud
NK103(pe)004:97: brlan pa de // rdzu 'phrul dang mngon shes rol
NK103(pe)004:98: pa phrin las kyis 'dul thabs la mkhas pa des
NK103(pe)004:99: brlan pa de // bya'o // sreg pa me dang
NK103(pe)004:100: gdab pa mchod rten dang bsgral ba gnas la sogs
NK103(pe)004:102: lhun gnas rang 'od kyi rnam pa cir yang 'char ba'i bdud rtsi de ni //
NK103(pe)004:103: dgra dang bgegs dang nad dang mtshon dang mu ge yi //
NK103(pe)004:104: gnyen por 'gyur te de dag rang sar zhi yang 'gal ba min pa de'o //
NK103(pe)004:105: zhi ba la bde gshegs kyi rigs /
NK103(pe)004:106: rgyas pa la nor bu'i rigs /
NK103(pe)004:107: dbang du gsung gi rigs sdud la //
NK103(pe)004:108: las rab kyi rigs kyis drag po mdzad pa'am yang na /
NK103(pe)004:109: kun 'dus pa lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad pa ste rdo rje dang drag po sbyar ba'am //
NK103(pe)004:110: gnas lugs byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po ni don bzhi rdzogs pa'i bdag /
NK103(pe)004:111: nyid yin pas rgyal ba'i rgyal ba 'phags pa'i 'phags pa lha yi lha'o //
NK103(pe)004:112: yid du mi 'ong ba dwang zhing che ba'i yon
NK103(pe)004:113: tan gyis khyab par mdzad la thugs rjes bsgyub bya
NK103(pe)004:114: la chags shing // sems rgyud rab tu khro ba'i
NK103(pe)004:115: thugs rje ste zhi rgyas dbang drag rim par sbyar
NK103(pe)004:116: ba'am chos nyid byang chub kyi sems la //
NK103(pe)004:117: mtshan mas stong pas zhi ba ye shes gsal bas rgyas pa /
NK103(pe)004:118: rang la rdzogs pas dbang la mi mthun pa dang bral //
NK103(pe)004:119: ba drag po ste de ltar rtogs pa'i ngang las
NK103(pe)004:120: ma yengs pas ting nge 'dzin gyi phur pa thebs
NK103(pe)004:121: pa'o // rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags bskyed
NK103(pe)004:122: pa'i sngags dang bcas pa'i ye shes can gyi sngags
NK103(pe)004:123: pa'o // kyi sham bur // las la sbyar ba'i
NK103(pe)004:124: sngags zhi ba la sh+ain+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa dang
NK103(pe)004:125: pa'o // kyi sham bur // // rgyas pa la push+tim ku ru s+w+aa h+aa dang /
NK103(pe)004:126: dbang la pa sham ku ru s+w+aa h+aa dang //
NK103(pe)004:127: drag po la a bi tsa ra m+aa ra ya zhes las bzhi'i //
NK103(pe)004:128: so so'i sngags btags pas las la sbyar ba'am //
NK103(pe)004:129: ngag tu brjod pa dang bral bar lhun grub kyi
NK103(pe)004:130: byin la 'gags med kyi rlabs dang ldan pa yi
NK103(pe)004:131: // chos nyid don gyi gsung gis yin lugs kyi gnad du dbab pa'o //
NK103(pe)004:132: phrin las bzhi'i tshul dang mthun par dbyibs ldan pa yi //
NK103(pe)004:134: sdod kyi stangs dang bca' ba'i phyag rgya 'du byed kyis ni //
NK103(pe)004:135: ting nge 'dzin gsal ba'i grogs dang las gang byed kyi stongs //
NK103(pe)004:136: thebs par 'gyur bas phyag rgya rgyas rin chen /
NK103(pe)004:139: gyad stabs las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
NK103(pe)004:140: byi ba dang glang gi lo la dpyid ka'i zla
NK103(pe)004:141: ba gsum gyi yar ngo'i tshes grangs gang rung la
NK103(pe)004:142: // nyi ma snga dro dang nam srod la zhi ba'i las bya ba'i dus ste //
NK103(pe)004:143: stag dang yos bu dang 'brug lo'i dbyar zla gsum gyi nya gsum gyi tshes grangs la //
NK103(pe)004:144: nyin gung dang nam gung gi gong gnyis su rgyas pa'i las bya bar shis pa yin la //
NK103(pe)004:145: rta dang sbrul gyi lo'i nam zla ston dang tshes nyi shu gnyis la //
NK103(pe)004:146: dgongs ka dang tho rangs dbang du sdud pa'i dus //
NK103(pe)004:147: spre'u dang bya dang khyi dang phag ni lo skor gyi dus dgun ni nam zla'i dus dang //
NK103(pe)004:148: mar gyi ngo'i bcu bzhi ni tshes grangs kyi dus
NK103(pe)004:149: gung gnyis ni nyin re mtshan re'i dus te bzhi
NK103(pe)004:151: yang na 'das ma 'ongs da ltar 'byung bar ma nges pa'am dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid la //
NK103(pe)004:152: yon tan rdzogs pas dus bzhi chig chod yin no //
NK103(pe)004:153: zlum po'i steng du gnas te kha shar du bltas pa ni zhi ba'i phyogs la //
NK103(pe)004:154: byang gru bzhi'i steng du gnas te kha lho ru bltas pa ni rgyas pa'i //
NK103(pe)004:155: shar zla gam gyi steng du gnas te kha nub tu bltas pa dbang gi //
NK103(pe)004:156: lho gru gsum gyi steng gnas kha byang du bltas pa ni drag po'i 'dug cing lta phyogs so //
NK103(pe)004:157: snod kyi 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bcur stong pa nyid kyi phyogs chen po ni //
NK103(pe)004:158: ched du ma btsal kyang ye nas lhun gyis grub pa yin no //
NK103(pe)004:159: zhi ba la bee d+aur+ya dkar po dang rgyas pa la rin chen gser dang //
NK103(pe)004:160: dbang la r+aa ga dmar po dang /
NK103(pe)004:161: drag po la in+d+ra n+ai la ljang gu rnams gong gi de bzhin du las kyi stongs la //
NK103(pe)004:162: rang bzhin nyid la las bzhi'i yon tan thams cad 'char bar ye nas gnas pa'i //
NK103(pe)004:163: lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang du thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)004:164: zhi sa phug dang rgyas nags tshal dang /
NK103(pe)004:166: drag grog le'i sa snar gnas bcas pa'am //
NK103(pe)004:167: don chos nyid gyi bzhugs sa gzhi yi gnas ni //
NK103(pe)004:168: kun gzhi rgyas pa'i gzhal yas so //
NK103(pe)004:174: drag dug sga sgog sngags kyis btul ba la sogs rtsub pa'i zas bza' zhing //
NK103(pe)004:175: nyams gang 'phel kyi 'tsho ba zho sha'i dgos pa'i cha rkyen no //
NK103(pe)004:176: las bzhi brtsams pa des ni bar chad kyi dgra zhi ba dang /
NK103(pe)004:177: don gyi ye shes rgyas pa dang //
NK103(pe)004:178: mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du 'dus pa dang /
NK103(pe)004:179: dgra bgegs kyi bar chad bral ba dang //
NK103(pe)004:180: lhun grub bde ba chen po'i ye shes rang la shar nas //
NK103(pe)004:181: gdul bya kun kyang lhun gnas kyi don bzhi la bkod pa'o //
NK103(pe)004:185: gnyis med kyi mu bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnas lugs la //
NK103(pe)004:186: chad lta dang thal 'gyur ba la las chos nyid stong par la bzlas te //
NK103(pe)004:187: 'gro ba duhkha las bskyab par 'dod pas lam pa'i smon lam gyi mthus 'grub par bltas pa //
NK103(pe)004:188: de yang 'gal te gang dang 'gal na stong pa dang 'gal //
NK103(pe)004:189: ji ltar na thams cad stong na don byed par 'dod pa'i smon pa nyid kyang stong par thal //
NK103(pe)004:190: de 'dod na de gnyis nus pa 'gal bas 'gro don grub pa min no //
NK103(pe)004:191: yod par lta ba sde lngas la las dngos po nyi tshe ba //
NK103(pe)004:192: ru 'dod pa de yang rang nyid dngos lta'i gdon gyis zin pa yin cing //
NK103(pe)004:193: dbu ma pa phyi rgyud la las bden pa don dam kun rdzob gnyis su khas blangs pa ni //
NK103(pe)004:194: yod med don la 'gal ba gnyis gshis gcig la bsdus pa yin //
NK103(pe)004:195: nang pa la las bden pa gnyis med kyi phyogs su khas blangs pa yis ni //
NK103(pe)004:196: rang dang rigs mthun pa 'gal 'khor ba'i duhkha las skyob pa yin //
NK103(pe)004:197: mu bzhi kun kyang rdzogs la phyogs gcig pa gang dang yang bral ba'o //
NK103(pe)004:198: byin gyi brlabs ni 'gro ba'i dpal du gyur pas //
NK103(pe)004:199: don mdzad pa ni rtsol ba med pas bde ba chen po la //
NK103(pe)004:200: gdul bya kun kyang bkod de rgyud dgrol ba'i thabs //
NK103(pe)004:201: ye shes kyi sprul pa cir yang 'char bas rin
NK103(pe)004:202: chen lta'u'i man ngag /'di la brten nas sems can
NK103(pe)004:203: kun grol bar shog cig pa'o //
NK103(pe)004:204: ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul las bzhir yongs su rdzogs par bstan pa /
NK103(pe)004:205: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ta dang /
NK103(pe)004:206: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)004:207: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur cing
NK103(pe)004:208: zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
